Name: Pigeon Softouch WN3 Nipple Blister Pack - 2 Pcs (Slow Flow)
Description:
**Pigeon Softouch WN3 Nipple Blister Pack** is the ideal solution to support a natural and smooth feeding experience for your baby. Developed with over 60 years of research, these nipples are designed to mimic natural breastfeeding, ensuring a seamless transition between breast and bottle feeding without causing nipple confusion. It features a super-soft, flexible 100% silicone nipple that closely resembles a mother's breast, promoting natural tongue movement and a proper latch. The advanced anti-colic air vent system effectively reduces swallowed air during feeding, helping to minimize discomfort and colic. Its design includes an additional latch-on line to ensure correct latch position, and a carefully shaped structure to perfectly fit a baby’s mouth for easy and secure feeding. Each **Pigeon Softouch WN3 Nipple Blister Pack** is available in various flow sizes to suit your baby's different developmental stages, and it is easy to clean and sterilize to ensure the highest levels of safety and hygiene.

🔹 Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Softouch WN3 Nipple Blister Pack**:
⭐ Attach the **Pigeon Softouch WN3 Nipple Blister Pack** securely to a compatible Pigeon bottle.
⭐ Ensure the nipple is properly positioned to allow milk to flow when pressure is applied.
⭐ Hold the bottle at an appropriate angle to ensure the milk flows smoothly during feeding.
⭐ Supervise your baby while feeding and adjust the nipple size as the baby’s needs and development progress.
⭐ Always supervise your baby during feeding to prevent choking or mishandling of the nipple.
⭐ Do not use the nipple as a soother to avoid prolonged sucking, which may lead to tooth decay.
⭐ Check the temperature of the milk before feeding to prevent burns or discomfort.

🔹 Ingredients of **Pigeon Softouch WN3 Nipple Blister Pack**:
⭐ Nipple is made from 100% silicone.
⭐ Design mimics mother's breast to promote natural latching and smooth tongue movement.
⭐ Advanced anti-colic air vent system to reduce swallowed air and minimize colic risk.
⭐ Latch-on line and structure designed to perfectly fit baby’s mouth for easy and secure feeding.
